author: justin wolcott
description: Traverse project structure and write file contents to a single output file
name: vomitorium

scripts.lint: ( which bun 2>&1 >/dev/null || ( npm -g install bun && bun upgrade ) ) && ( bun --bun x xo --fix . ; bun --bun x @biomejs/biome check --reporter=summary --write --unsafe . )
scripts.start: ( which bun 2>&1 >/dev/null || ( npm -g install bun && bun upgrade ) ) && bun vomitorium.js
